book:
MATE Accessibility Developers Guide
The MATE Accessibility Guide is for developers who want to ensure their programming efforts are accessible to the widest audience of users. This guide also covers many of the Section 508 requirements.
2008 Vincent Alexander
2001, 2002 Calum Benson, Brian Cameron, Bill Haneman, Padraig O'Briain, Sharon Snider
MATE Documentation Project
